events.title: the High Court sides with the New York Times

movie.title: The Post
movie.plot: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 111 nominations.

movie.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
movie.plot: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.

events.title: the Yarnell Hill Fire kills 19 members of the Granite Mountain Hotshots

movie.title: Only the Brave
movie.plot: Members of the Granite Mountain Hotshots battle deadly wildfires to save an Arizona town.
